Portfolio

Timeline

Here is a simple timeline of my life events and professional experience:

April 1995 — Birth

I was born in April 1995 in Bogotá, Colombia.

June 2000 — My sisters were born

My twin sisters were born in June 2000 in Bogotá, Colombia.

September 2005 — Got my first PS1

I got my first PS1 in September 2005, and spent uncountable hours playing games like Crash Bandicoot, Spyro, and Final Fantasy VII.

December 2011 — Graduated from high school

Graduate at 17 years old from high school. At that time I was obsessed with anime and video games.

February 2012 — Moved to London, UK

I moved to London, UK in February 2012 for a year of exchange. In there I met my wife.

January 2013 — Started university

I started university in January 2013, studying Industrial Engineering at Universidad Nueva Granada in Bogotá, Colombia.

November 2013 — My first trip to Japan

I went to Japan for the first time in November 2013, and it was love at first sight.

August 2016 — Got my first job

I got my first job in August 2016, working as a bilingal customer service representative. Just a fancy name to say that I was answering phone calls from angry customers that had problems with their internet connection.

July 2017 — Got a job as an HR intern in Schlumberger

I got a job as an HR intern in Schlumberger, one of the biggest in July 2017, and it was a great experience. I learned a lot about the oil and gas industry, and I also got to work with some amazing people.

January 2018 — Got married

I got married to my wife in January 2018 after 6 years of a long distance relationship.

November 2018 — Moved to Japan

I moved to Japan in November 2018, and it was a dream come true. I had always wanted to live in Japan, and I finally got the chance to do it and live with my wife.

April 2020 — Graduated from Akamonkai Nihongo Gakko.

I graduated from Akamonkai Nihongo Gakko in April 2020, spent a year and three months studying Japanese while working part time doing deliveries for Uber Eats and working in a restaurant bar.

May 2021 — Started working as a software engineer

I started working as a software engineer in May 2021 at Xenon Partners. I had been learning to code for a while, and I finally got the chance to work in the field. My job was to develop and maintain a Rails monolith application called Packagecloud.

September 2022 — Started working at GMO Internet Group

I started working at GMO Internet Group in September 2022, I am currently working as a software engineer in the GMO Trust team, developing and maintaining Rails applications and microservices for the financial and blockchain services industry.

January 2025 — My first child was born

My first child was born in January 2025. His name is Sora, and he is the most beautiful thing in the world. I am so proud to be his father.

IvanReyesO7 Ivan Reyes
